EmailTemplate.subject: Attending Citrix Synergy 2017? Visit the Turbonomic Booth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-vdi-trial/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Are you going to Citrix Synergy in Orlando, FL? If so, we’d love to meet you! You can find a number of Turbonomic representatives at booth 509, showcasing our partnership with Citrix to assure VDI performance and improve hybrid cloud management.
With Turbonomic and Citrix, you’re able to:
- Assure XenServer and XenDesktop workload performance - Maximize utilization of your cloud or virtual environment - Automate bounding of cloned application instances with the NetScaler load balancer in private and hybrid clouds
Don’t just take our word for it -- stop by our booth to see it for yourself. And if you can’t make it to the conference, you can access information on Turbonomic’s support for VDI <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-vdi-trial/]]>, as well as download a free 30-day trial on our website.
Hope to see you in Orlando!
Best, - The Turbonomic Team
